function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Closure of parks with physical barriers and instruction not to visit other parks may lead to overcrowding in the open parks.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission due to overcrowding in open parks.","Mitigation":"Implement a system to monitor park occupancy and enforce capacity limits. Encourage the use of alternative outdoor spaces to distribute visitors.","Technologies":"Park occupancy monitoring systems, public communication platforms to inform alternative outdoor spaces.","People":"Visitors to the parks, local residents near the parks.","Owner":"Municipal government, park management authorities."},{"Description":"Pilot opening of parks without monitoring precautions may lead to non-compliance with safety measures.","Impact":"Risk of contagious disease spread due to lack of adherence to safety precautions in the open parks.","Mitigation":"Implement a monitoring system for safety precautions, conduct regular checks, and provide clear guidelines to visitors.","Technologies":"Safety precaution monitoring systems, communication tools for providing guidelines.","People":"Visitors to the parks, local residents near the parks.","Owner":"Municipal government, park management authorities."},{"Description":"Conversion of roads to pedestrian areas may lead to increased interaction and close contact among pedestrians.","Impact":"Potential increase in the risk of contagious disease transmission due to close contact in pedestrian areas.","Mitigation":"Enforce social distancing measures in the pedestrian areas, provide clear guidelines for pedestrian behavior, and monitor crowd density.","Technologies":"Crowd density monitoring systems, public communication platforms for guidelines.","People":"Pedestrians using the converted roads, local residents near the pedestrian areas.","Owner":"Municipal government, traffic management authorities."}]}
